name: Gregory Maya 10 Daypack - Women's
description: A smallish pack that rides nice and stable during aerobic pursuits. The design is made to suit women's smaller torsos and works for active days of running or hiking. The Maya 10 features a BioSync trail suspension system with flexible tendons that connect the shoulder harness and waistbelt, stretching and retracting to move with your body. An internal compression system is adjustable on the fly to keep the pack snug against your back as you hike, scramble or trail run.BioSync suspension offers a close fit that doesn’t restrict your movement.Mesh on waist, shoulder straps and back panel wicks moisture to keep you cool.Hydration system-ready with an external sleeve for easy refills, smart tube routing and a mouthpiece keeper clip on shoulder harness.2 waistbelt pockets.Sunglasses stash on shoulder harness.2 external side pockets and 1 external zippered top pocket with zippered mesh security compartment.Zippered top pocket has a soft lining to protect your sunglasses.Expandable front pocket with bungee closure holds a extra layers.Lash point for bike light.Designed for up to 7kg/15lb of weight.
